Text: First releaser to, didnt know that, K heres how to play a RMVB for those who dont know, i use Combined community codec pack (easily google- able) and add in Real Player Alternative aka Quicktime Lite codec to play these RMVB,RM,etc style files thru media player classic, I havent liked VLC for a while now a lot of my files were skipping and network play kept stalling on me so i switched to MPC
